spell.name: Precognition

m.text: a gemstone worth at least 50 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: Focusing your magic you seek the best path ahead, allowing you to react to the immediate future.
Until the end of your next turn you may reroll any failed attack rolls, ability checks and saving throws for the duration, accepting the second roll even if it is also a failure.
Additionally, other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against you for the duration.

spell.name: Robert's Coin
entries: You coerce the strands of fate to be either incredibly cruel or incredibly kind to you. The next time you are required to roll a {@dice d20} during the spell's duration, flip a coin and choose a side instead. If the side you chose lands face up, your {@dice d20} roll is a natural 20; otherwise it is a natural 1.
Once you have substituted a roll, the spell ends.

spell.name: Foxfire's Curse

components.m: a weighted dice or any unlucky object

entries: An air of misfortune surrounds your target; making anything that could go badly, go badly without great effort. One creature of your choice within range must succeed a Charisma saving throw whenever they make an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw (other than saving throws against this spell). On a failed saving throw, the creature treats a {@dice d20} roll of 11 or higher as a 10.

spell.name: Roar's Malediction
entries: You toy with potential futures to make your foe's attacks barely scratch their targets. One creature of your choice within range must succeed a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save each time the target rolls damage for an attack or spell, they must roll each damage die twice and choose the lower result.
At the end of each of the target's turns, it can make a Constitution saving throw against the spell. On a success, the spell ends.

spell.name: Ambling Abode
entries: Choose a building no larger than 30 feet wide or long and no taller than two stories; then flip a coin. On a heads the building sprouts a pair of bird legs, it becomes awakened and acts with a mind of its own for the duration of the spell. The building acts similar to a domesticated chicken unless controlled by other means. At sundown the building will find a smaller one to nest upon.
On a tails the building grows wings and flies away.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the maximum size for building increases by 10 feet for the width and length, and an additional story for the height.

spell.name: Borrowed Time
entries: You reach forward in time to steal life essence from the future to heal the present. A willing creature of your choice that you can see within range regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs. At the end of the duration you take necrotic damage, which can't be reduced in any way, equal to the amount you healed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Rewind

components.m: a pocketwatch, hourglass, or similar timepiece

entries: You intertwine yourself in a moment with a space in time, briefly continuining before snapping back to your past self. When you cast this spell note down the location where you cast it and your current hit points. At the end of your next turn you revert back to the noted location and your hitpoints change to match the noted amount.

If the location is occupied when you return to it, you and whatever occupies it take {@damage 5d10} force damage. You then appear in the nearest unnocupied space. If the force damage reduces you to 0 hit points, you and everything you are wearing and carrying, except magic items, are reduced to a pile of fine gray dust.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration for the spell increases by one additional turn. For example, casting this spell with a spell slot of 5th level means you revert to the noted location at the end of your third turn after casting the spell.

spell.name: Prescience
entries: You effortlessly predict the paths of shots and swords. By focussing your magic even more closely you can even guide your allies' aim.
Choose a creature you can see within range. That creature has advantage on attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Foreboding
entries: Using your magical insights, you are able to predict when your foes are about to charge towards you or throw an attack, even before they themselves have realised it.

Choose two creatures you can see within range. Until the spell ends the targets can use their reaction to make a single melee attack against a creature that makes an attack against them within their reach.
The creature may instead use their reaction to make a single ranged attack against a creature that moves at least 5 feet towards them within their spell's or weapon's range.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Misfortune

components.m: a weighted dice or any unlucky object

entries: You twist the strands of fate to allow the strongest of blows to be dealt to your enemies.

Choose up to three creatures you can see within range, they must succeed a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, until the spell ends any damage die rolled against the target may be re-rolled, choosing the higher of the two results. This only affects the damage dealt to the target of the spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Summon Mageblade
entries: You evoke an ethereal blade in your free hand. The blade is similar in size and shape to a longsword, and it lasts for the duration. If you let go of the blade, it disappears, but you can evoke the blade again as a bonus action.

The blade is treated as a melee weapon that you are proficient with and that deals {@damage 2d4} force damage on a hit. You can choose to add your spellcasting ability modifier for the attack and damage rolls instead of your Strength modifier.
Additionally the blade sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet.

spell.name: Jaden's Duel Detection
entries: For the duration, you sense the presence of conflicts, duels or other altercations within 120 feet of you. If you sense conflict in this way, you can use your action to determine, if any, the name and rules of the current conflict as well as the number of combatants or players.
Such a spell will also detect the presence of any active card games.
The spell can penetrate most barriers, but it is blocked by 1 foot of stone, 1 inch of common metal, a thin sheet of lead, or 3 feet of wood or dirt.

spell.name: Endurance
entries: You reach into the essence of a creature, willing them to reknit bones, heal flesh and banish fatigue so they can continue the fight.
Choose one creature you can see. For the duration of the spell the chosen creature gains the following benefits:
The first time the creature is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, it drops to 1 hit point instead.
If the creature takes damage that is greater than half its hit point maximum, the creature instead takes half its hit point maximum in damage.
The creature has resistance to all non-magical damage.
The creature's movement speed can never be reduced below 10 feet.

spell.name: Forewarning
entries: Your prophetic powers allow you to walk through a hail of arrows unscathed and dodge weapon blows the split second they're made against you.
Choose a creature you can see within range. Until the spell ends it gains a +2 bonus to AC and it has advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Haemorrhage
entries: Choose one creature within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. The target takes {@damage 8d8} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

If the target is reduced to 0 hit points by this spell it dies instantly and you may select another target within 15 feet to make a Constitution saving throw as if they were the original target of the spell.

spell.name: Iron Arm
entries: You weave your magic to turn your flesh into living metal, allowing you to shrug off hits and pulp skulls with your bare fists.
For the duration of the spell you gain a +3 bonus to your Strength and Consitution scores. This may raise your scores above 20 but not above 30.
Additionally you gain a +1 bonus to your AC and you can roll a {@dice d4} in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strikes.

spell.name: Perfect Timing
entries: Briefly scanning the immediate future you use your magic to seek out the best moments to strike your enemies.
Choose a creature you can see within range. Until the spell ends the creature's attacks ignore the effects of half and three-quarters cover.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Smite
entries: Four lethal bolts of lightning leap from your fingertips, tearing your foes apart. You can hurl them at one target or several.
Make a ranged spell attack for each bolt. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d8 + 1} lightning damage. You have advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armour made of metal.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional bolt for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Absorb Impact

time.condition: which you take when you take bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage

entries: The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra {@damage 1d6} damage of the triggering type, and the spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
